about.title: about me
about.body:
Hi!ðŸ‘‹  I'm James.

I'm a London-based front-end developer currently working building great Shopify sites at WeMakeWebsites.

I love working with Javascript and Vue, solving problems and constantly learning.

When I'm not developing I'm drinking coffee or beer, stand-up paddleboarding, playing games on my Nintendo Switch (currently playing Mario + Rabbids: Kingdom Battle and Super Metroid) and getting out in the countryside.
